text: @kimguilfoyle @JoeBiden @kimguilfoyle I am a Mom and even though my son has already graduated, I think any mother who would endanger her children because it is more 'convenient' for her if their children return to school is selfis Coronavirus is NOT a hoax and children are just as vulnerable as adults
